Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Bundle
Reviews.Author: Craig Vogel
Reviews.Content: Thanks 'TheImageWorld'! The camera bundle is great.  The bundle provided everything that you need take photos as well as keep the camera and lenses clean and safe.  For the price, the product is hard to beat!

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light
Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2) for shooting at high or low angles and 1,040,000-dot VGA with reflection reduction
Video Snapshot features for enhanced video shooting options
Comes with camera body, EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II lens, eyecup, wide strap, USB cable, AV cable, battery, and charger
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II + Canon 55-250mm IS Lens + Large Camera and Lens Case + 32 GB Card + Card Reader + Extra Battery Pack + 2 58mm UV Filters + Memory Card Wallet + Cleaning Kit
